Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2015 06:11PM SuzyQ42 wrote: I was diagnosed on April 3rd and my surgery is scheduled for April 28th. I was diagnosed on Friday and had my first visit with my surgeon the following Tuesday. Things have moved very fast and while I'm mostly grateful, sometimes it can be a bit overwhelming. Sending you peace and strength.
Posts.Title: How soon after DX for surgery? helplesslyhoping tjh
